name: milesdonovan
text: A comment left by milesdonovan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by reburn, Connellingus, Taidje_Khan)

name: closefriend
text: That had to be a bit of a departure from Jeffy's dotted-line tracks or Garfield stealing Jon's lasagna.

name: likeiwassaying
text: why would anyone lame this?

name: zem
text: Panel 3: "whoa"

name: centipede_damascus
text: Philipe encounters a moment of natural majesty and in one terrible moment it is gone.

name: deancain29
text: beautiful artwork

name: andrew_
text: you said it all.

name: andrew_
text: con? what the hell?

name: mobro_4000
text: A comment left by mobro_4000 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, GMM, kiyomonster)

name: closefriend
text: Holy shit did I misread that at first.

name: gmm
text: Yeah, shit got REAL awkward for a second

name: ted0phile
text: You, sir, just made me laugh aloud.

name: dovey
text: 3.9? What is wrong with you people

name: pepperhittherim
text: I wonder if Phillipe has any teeth...

name: kledermans
text: I hope so; how else can he grip the wheel?

name: dans
text: Probably not after hitting that deer.

name: carlyle
text: Seven teeth in the steering wheel.

name: retinarow
text: Phillipe drives with his mouth.

name: macdaddyw
text: I've often wondered how he is working the pedals when he is driving with his mouth

name: tellumo
text: He uses the cruise control, occasionally kicking the buttons to speed up or slow down. Nice Pete installed it for one of his many cross-country road trips.

name: c_dizzle
text: Utter sadness. And eyebrow expressiveness.

name: vucubcaquix
text: Otter sadness.

name: lobster_mobster
text: this strip is absolutely perfect and arouses a feeling that expresses the exact nature of my entire life.

name: molesticide
text: that is depressing as HELL

name: soticoto
text:
Philippe killed Bambi!

That is singularly the most awesome thing ever! Schadenfreudegasm!
Here comes a special van!

name: semiquaver
text: "Here comes a special van" is twisted and sadistic and awesome.

name: soticoto
text:
I'd like to think that describes me in a nutshell.

... If I had a shell, it would be called a nutshell, and then my webname would truly be justified.

name: jexxe
text: it's funnier when you first look and see the deer as a small whale on its side, flopping down from the sky only to be hit by a van.

name: sncether
text: Wow, thanks for this. It's like I now have a special "bonus" strip.

name: deusoma
text: It makes Phillipe's surprised face all the better!

name: killerlimpet
text: Oh no, not again!

name: dickie_roxx
text: Chubbied for the most perfect thing to say, ever.

name: skaterpix
text: He hit the deer!

name: davey-boy
text: Yes he did.

name: laserblade
text:
mmm whatcha say

mmm thatcha only meant well

well of course you did

name: rowboat
text: Memories of this terrible meme should not survive forever on Assetbar. But they will.

name: sex_bicycle
text: i actually said OHHHH NOOOOOOOO! outloud :( poor philippe a killer and still so young :( i bet it was bambis mother

name: greenkoolayd
text: well, kid, youre a man now.

name: hoarday4
text: It's Tuesday September 14th at 3:52pm and at this time the comic has been replaced by a 1cm square thumbnail of a baby smoking a joint in a rasta-cap. Am I the only one seeing this?
